trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of installers to be run during an installation.

The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> provides the methods and properties that your application needs to manage a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>提供的方法和屬性，您的應用程式需要管理的集合<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use any of the following three ways to add installers to the collection:
trans-unit.target: 使用任何的安裝程式加入至集合的下列三種方式：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A> method adds a single installer to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A>方法會將單一安裝程式加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A> methods add multiple installers to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A>方法加入至集合的多個安裝程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A> method and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Item%2A> property, which is the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> indexer, each add a single installer to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A>方法和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Item%2A>屬性，這是<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>索引子，每個將單一安裝程式加入至集合中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Remove installers through the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 移除透過安裝程式<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Check whether an installer is in the collection by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 檢查安裝程式是否在集合中，使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Find where an installer is located in the collection by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 尋找其中安裝程式位於集合中使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The installers in a collection are run when the installer containing the collection, as specified by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, calls their <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的安裝程式執行時安裝程式，含有所指定的集合<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，會呼叫其<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>，或<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For examples of the usage of an installer collection, see the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> classes.
trans-unit.target: 如需安裝程式集合的使用方式的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example provides an implementation similar to that of [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md).
trans-unit.target: 此範例中提供類似的實作[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。

trans-unit.source: It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly.
trans-unit.target: 它會與之前的該特定的組件選項安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assembly's options are taken if there is a previous assembly in the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果選項未指定組件中前, 一個組件的選項是如果在清單中上一個組件。

trans-unit.source: If the "/u" or "/uninstall" option is specified, the assemblies are uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 「 / u"或"/ 解除安裝 」 指定選項時，會解除安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: If the "/?"
or "/help" option is provided, the help information is displayed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 或"/ 說明 」 提供選項，主控台就會顯示 [說明] 資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> that represents the installer to add to the collection.
Adds the specified installer to this collection of installers.
The zero-based index of the added installer.

The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to specify the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>加入之屬性<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>設為指定<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>包含此集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是在此範例的摘錄<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified installers to this collection.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> that represents the installers to add to this collection.
Adds the specified array of installers to this collection.

The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of each added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>屬性的每個已加入<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>設<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>包含此集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: It creates <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> instances for `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.These instances are added to a <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>的執行個體`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。這些執行個體加入至<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>。

trans-unit.source: The installation process installs both `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程序會同時`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection" /> that represents the installers to add to this collection.
Adds the specified collection of installers to this collection.

The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of each added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>屬性的每個已加入<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>設<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>包含此集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A> method and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A>方法和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: It creates <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> instances for `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>的執行個體`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。

trans-unit.source: These instances of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> are added to a <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> named `myTransactedInstaller1`.
trans-unit.target: 這些執行個體的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>加入至<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>名為`myTransactedInstaller1`。

trans-unit.source: The installers in the `myTransactedInstaller1` are copied to another <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> named `myTransactedInstaller2`.
trans-unit.target: 中的安裝程式`myTransactedInstaller1`複製到另一個<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>名為`myTransactedInstaller2`。

trans-unit.source: The installation process installs both `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程序會同時`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> that represents the installer to look for.
Determines whether the specified installer is included in collection.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified installer is in this collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A> method, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A> method, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A>方法，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>方法，和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: It creates <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> instances for `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>的執行個體`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。

trans-unit.source: These instances are added to a <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 這些執行個體加入至<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>。

trans-unit.source: `MyAssembly2.exe` is then removed from the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: `MyAssembly2.exe` 移除<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>。

trans-unit.source: The installation process starts and installs only `MyAssembly1.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 啟動安裝程序，並只會安裝`MyAssembly1.exe`。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy to.
The index of the array at which to paste the collection.
Copies the items from the collection to an array, begining at the specified index.
The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.CopyTo%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: It creates <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> instances for `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>的執行個體`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。

trans-unit.source: These instances are added to a <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 這些執行個體加入至<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>。

trans-unit.source: The names of the assemblies to be installed are displayed on the console.
trans-unit.target: 安裝組件名稱會顯示在主控台上。

trans-unit.source: The installation process installs both `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程序會同時`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> to locate in the collection.
Determines the index of a specified installer in the collection.
The zero-based index of the installer in the collection.
The following example is the same as the example in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是中的範例相同<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on this example, please see the Example section of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the installer.
The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> to insert.
Inserts the specified installer into the collection at the specified index.
The following example is the same as the example in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是中的範例相同<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on this example, please see the Example section of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the installer to get or set.
Gets or sets an installer at the specified index.
An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> that represents the installer at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> ，代表指定索引處的安裝程式。

trans-unit.source: When the specified <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> that contains the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當指定<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>放在<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>、<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>屬性<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>設<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>其中包含的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> instances for `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>的執行個體`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。

trans-unit.source: These instances are added to a <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 這些執行個體加入至<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>。

trans-unit.source: The names of all the assemblies that are to be installed are displayed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 要安裝的所有組件名稱會顯示到主控台。

trans-unit.source: The installation process installs both `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程序會同時`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert <c>value</c>.
The new value of the installer at <c>index</c>.
Performs additional custom processes before a new installer is inserted into the collection.
The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> can be found.
The installer to be removed from <c>index</c>.
Performs additional custom processes before an installer is removed from the collection.
The zero-based index at which to replace <c>oldValue</c>.
The value to replace with <c>newValue.</c>
The new value of the installer at <c>index</c>.
Performs additional custom processes before an existing installer is set to a new value.
An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> that represents the installer to remove.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> from the collection.
The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the removed <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>屬性移除<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>設`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example is the same as the example in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是中的範例相同<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on this example, please see the Example section of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>方法。
